column2: ## NOTE: No need to change this!

msg = "Take a closer look at the definition of the standard error. We only divide by sqrt(n) when using the standard deviation of the *population* (not the standard deviation of the *samping distribution*)."

Error: Take a closer look at the definition of the standard error. We only divide by sqrt(n) when using the standard deviation of the *population* (not the standard deviation of the *samping distribution*).
